message.body: Am I driving you to work tom?
I will let you know
Steph never got the refund for the second ladder
Michell i will text you about 4.00 to see about driving me dad will try our car if it start up right away them he will drive me
And if steph never got credited back i have you the paper work so give it to me and i will call them
What paperwork? Bec now I have to find it bec I don't remember
And damn I have to wait until 4:00?
The one dad gave you that we sent it back
Ok well ill have to look bec idk what paperwork he gave me
Well all she would have to do is call qvc she should of got a credit a long time ago
I know ok ill calk them later... does dad have an email for the order or did I use my email? Bec ill need an order number most likely
And you know I leave to get Robert at 330 so I'd prefer you tell me what I'm doing before 4:00
Why do you leave so early
Bec he gets done around 430. Takes 40 mins to get there.
I get done work at 330 so no point going all the wsy to leave in 5 mins. I leave straight from my job
No point going sll the way home**
Ok i will tell dad to try the car around 3
Ok will you still drive in the rain
Ok unless you just want me to take you regardless of the car. I don't care I just wanna know what I'm doing bec ill go to your house straight from work
I don't wanna work near your house then go home near the stadium to drive back to your house to drive back to stadium
Ok but if my car starts if will take me and if it is raining to bad let robert take the subway
I know not to go to temple if its raining too hard
And you sure you don't just want me to take you anyway?
I will let you know when i in home at 2
